name: part_006
file: tmp_【3D LIVE - HOPE UPON A STAR 】IRyS 2025 BIRTHDAY LIVE #IRySBDay2025 [V0plPBgyqPs]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: IRyS performs a cover of 'Hohoemi no Bakudan' on a retro-themed 3D stage.
MC segment where IRyS talks about the performance and introduces a boombox prop.
IRyS announces her 2025 Birthday Celebration merch with on-screen graphics.

subtitles.original: オトナさ
subtitles.english: Adulthood

subtitles.original: メチャメチャ 苦しい壁だってふいに
subtitles.english: A sudden, impossibly difficult wall

subtitles.original: なぜか ぶち壊す 勇気とPOWER 湧いてくるのは
subtitles.english: Somehow, the courage and POWER to smash it comes welling up

subtitles.original: メチャメチャ 厳しい人達がふいに
subtitles.english: The people who are incredibly strict suddenly

subtitles.original: 見せた 優しさの せいだったり するんだろうね
subtitles.english: Showed kindness, and that must be the reason

subtitles.original: アリガトウゴザイます!
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: 今まで 何回 よろしくと元気に 叫んだだろう
subtitles.english: I wonder how many times I've energetically shouted 'Hello!'

subtitles.original: 今まで 何回 さよならと泣いて 別れただろう
subtitles.english: I wonder how many times I've cried while saying 'Goodbye'

subtitles.original: どっちだろう 比べて多い 数は
subtitles.english: I wonder which one has the higher count

subtitles.original: 中にイコール 書いて
subtitles.english: Drawing an equals sign in the middle

subtitles.original: ちょっぴりオトナさ
subtitles.english: I'm a little bit of an adult

subtitles.original: メチャメチャ 悲しいときだってふいに
subtitles.english: Even when I'm incredibly sad, suddenly

subtitles.original: なぜか 乗り越える 勇気とPOWER 湧いてくるのは
subtitles.english: Somehow, the courage and POWER to overcome it comes welling up

subtitles.original: メチャメチャ やさしい人達がふいに
subtitles.english: The people who are incredibly kind suddenly

subtitles.original: 見せた 厳しさの せいだったり するんだろうね
subtitles.english: Showed strictness, and that must be the reason

subtitles.original: アリガトウゴザイます!
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: メチャメチャ 苦しい壁だってふいに
subtitles.english: A sudden, impossibly difficult wall

subtitles.original: なぜか ぶち壊す 勇気とPOWER 湧いてくるのは
subtitles.english: Somehow, the courage and POWER to smash it comes welling up

subtitles.original: メチャメチャ 厳しい人達がふいに
subtitles.english: The people who are incredibly strict suddenly

subtitles.original: 見せた 優しさの せいだったり するんだろうね
subtitles.english: Showed kindness, and that must be the reason

subtitles.original: メチャメチャ 楽しいときだって 忘れないよ
subtitles.english: I won't forget even the incredibly fun times

subtitles.original: いつまでも 勇気とPOWER なくさないよ
subtitles.english: I'll never lose my courage and POWER

subtitles.original: メチャメチャ ひとりぼっちの人に あげる
subtitles.english: I'll give it to the people who are incredibly lonely

subtitles.original: 唇の 裏側に 隠してある
subtitles.english: Hidden on the inside of my lips

subtitles.original: 微笑みの爆弾!
subtitles.english: The Smile Bomb!

subtitles.original: And that was Hohoemi no Bakudan!
subtitles.english: And that was Hohoemi no Bakudan!

subtitles.original: Osh! Osh! Osh! Osh!
subtitles.english: Osh! Osh! Osh! Osh!

subtitles.original: Why is it not turning off?
subtitles.english: Why is it not turning off?

subtitles.original: You guys didn't hear anything, right?
subtitles.english: You guys didn't hear anything, right?

subtitles.original: 何も聞いてないよね？
subtitles.english: You guys didn't hear anything, right?

subtitles.original: You guys were deaf for a second, I'm sure, right?
subtitles.english: You guys were deaf for a second, I'm sure, right?

subtitles.original: 何も聞いてない。大丈夫。
subtitles.english: You didn't hear anything. It's fine.

subtitles.original: Anyways, do you guys know what this is?
subtitles.english: Anyways, do you guys know what this is?

subtitles.original: It's my boombox!
subtitles.english: It's my boombox!

subtitles.original: ラジカセでございます。
subtitles.english: It is a radio cassette player.

subtitles.original: I'll be using this later, so let me put it back down.
subtitles.english: I'll be using this later, so let me put it back down.

subtitles.original: But I just wanted to do that. It's my boombox.
subtitles.english: But I just wanted to do that. It's my boombox.

subtitles.original: It changes the world, but I don't have boiled goose.
subtitles.english: It changes the world, but I don't have boiled goose.

subtitles.original: Anyways, it's cool and retro, and actually...
subtitles.english: Anyways, it's cool and retro, and actually...

subtitles.original: I have a couple of announcements for the show.
subtitles.english: I have a couple of announcements for the show.

subtitles.original: But first, I want to talk about one obvious announcement.
subtitles.english: But first, I want to talk about one obvious announcement.

subtitles.original: The merch!
subtitles.english: The merch!

subtitles.original: Yes! 実は今回のライブは...
subtitles.english: Yes! Actually, for this live...

subtitles.original: ビッグなお知らせが本当にたくさんあるんですけど...
subtitles.english: there are really a lot of big announcements...

subtitles.original: その前にね、IRySの記念グッズ、紹介しようと思います。
subtitles.english: but before that, I'd like to introduce IRyS's commemorative goods.

subtitles.original: Isn't it cute? I wanted to create a set that matches the retro feel of today's live.
subtitles.english: Isn't it cute? I wanted to create a set that matches the retro feel of today's live.

subtitles.original: So let's take a look at what kind of goods are available.
subtitles.english: So let's take a look at what kind of goods are available.

subtitles.original: ではどんなグッズがあるのか、見ていきましょう！
subtitles.english: Then let's see what kind of goods there are!

subtitles.original: First off, we have the Concert PosteRyS!
subtitles.english: First off, we have the Concert PosteRyS!

subtitles.original: Isn't it sexy?
subtitles.english: Isn't it sexy?

subtitles.original: I wanted to make it look like a poster for an in-real-life concert.
subtitles.english: I wanted to make it look like a poster for an in-real-life concert.

subtitles.original: This time, actually, continuing from last time as well...
subtitles.english: This time, actually, continuing from last time as well...

subtitles.original: the illustration is by Pisuke-sensei!
subtitles.english: the illustration is by Pisuke-sensei!
